name: Truck Simulator - Truck Games
description:
As an heavy truck driver, You will get a chance of big oil trucks driving in this game with thriller missions. You are the oil tanker truck driver in the city simulator. Play the transport truck simulator games which are very full of enjoy.We added the best oil tanker in the free oil tanker game.

In the oil tanker drive simulator, you will transport oil to the city and village. Oil tanker drive is the best cargo truck driver and big truck driving. You can visit the city, hills, and offroad in the oil tanker transporter. Enjoy oil tanker cargo truck game 2022. Oil Tanker - Truck Simulator is a real Indian cargo truck, American truck, and euro truck simulator game.

Added Indian truck, American truck, and euro truck.
Enjoy city truck simulator environment.
Hill environment is too good.
Cargo woods and pipes on multiple destinations.
awesome controls
All features of the Indian cargo truck are perfectly working.
